lines: ﻿The three of them lay down in the shade. "Trees are so lucky," the farmer said. "Standing in one place they get their fill. Life's a struggle for us---going from the house to the farm, from the farm to the market, from the market to the forest, from the forest to the village. Hurrying back and forth, my feet have got worn out."
Laughing at the farmer's words, Mango said to himself, "Don't move for two days and then talk! I was bored to tears standing in one place!

Soon afterwards the farmer's family left and Mango set off in the opposite direction. He reached the top of the highest hill. A beautiful sight met his eyes! From above, the rough trunks of trees weren't visible only their green tops and green foliage. Each tree had its own shade of green, full of freshness.
